disobedience.question: Did I use Sunday for work when it could have been avoided, showing disrespect for this day of rest?

condoning.question: Have I ever told other Catholics that they should stay away from Sacraments or Mass?

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others would lose their blessings, such as financial security, good health, or other gifts, in order to feel more comfortable with my own situation?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in our community events or gatherings
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, potentially hurting their dignity in our community events or gatherings?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use my words to wound or offend others in public or social settings?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with hurtful or unbecoming words in social situations , such as when volunteering at local community events
such as when volunteering at local community events
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with hurtful or unbecoming words in social situations, such as when volunteering at local community events?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking while neglecting my responsibilities and duties
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking while neglecting my responsibilities and duties?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: at community events or with close friends
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, especially when sharing stories or experiences at community events or with close friends?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I spoken to others about my acquaintances' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

anger.question: Have I nursed anger rather than seeking reconciliation in my relationships, particularly within close family members?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
